issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Google analytics module , I have downloaded from GitTio.

Google analytics version - 3.0.4

May be some methods and classes are missing.
If anybody have some ideas regarding this google analytics module please share it.

In latest Google Analytics module (3.0.4) getTracker() method does not exists but in previous versions of module it was there. So after updating the module its throwing runtime error.

Please help us.
Thanks in advance
fields.summary: Google analytics 3.0.4 Is not working in latest Ti Sdk 6.0.0
fields.environment:
Appcelerator studio version - 4.8.0.201611121409
Titanium Sdk version- 6.0.0
Appcelerator CLI version - 6.0.0
Node js version - 6.9.2
Mac os version - 10.12.2

comments.body: We are not the maintainer of the Google Maps module, please get in touch with the maintainer for an updated version that works with the latest SDK, thx!
